projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: AI Application for Detecting Human in Animation Movies
projects.bodyText:
- Developed Preprocessing strategy to filter image duplication and use open source pretrained model to detect human in animation movies
- Increased 6% accuracy from using customized dataset compared to baseline model

projects.title: App Selling Code Game
projects.bodyText:
- Built website using NodeJS to sell code Game for client
 - Built SQL scripts to preprocess raw data and populate data in PostgreSQL database
 - Built CRUD operations on multiple components with PostgreSQL database
 - Integrated project with Docker and SSO from Facebook and Google api
 - Applied Agile methodologies in project development, Trell with 6-week Sprint delivery to submit teacher’s requirements

projects.title: KenKen Puzzle Android Mobile Game
projects.bodyText:
- Design a Simple Java Kotlin Android Mobile Game Application
 - Applied Java and Kotlin to construct the game's logic on the console before migrating to Android
 - Utilized the Model-View-Controller-ViewModel (MVCVM) architecture
 - Leveraging XML layouts and Android Studio’s drag-and-drop editor for a user-centric design.
 - Sets up observers on LiveData objects to automatically update the UI in response to data changes
 - Design Fragment Lifecycle to handle the game’s state and user interactions

projects.title: CPU Scheduling Algorithm
projects.bodyText:
- Created a desktop application providing essential graphs for calculating various CPU scheduling algorithms.
 - Developed the UI using Swing GUI.
 - Calculated waiting times, turnaround times, and their averages responsively.
 - Wrote unit tests to check the correctness of each algorithm.
 - Drew Gantt Charts to depict the scheduling progress.
 - Implemented scheduling algorithms for CPU and I/O and performed calculations.

projects.title: Food Supply Chain
projects.bodyText:
- Build web app using Typescript and GO 
- Modified open-source code to be able to establish network written in GO
- Using 3 organization from default code named it as Manufacturer, Distributor and Retailer
 - Collaborate and build smart contracts and ledger to store data in CouchDB, and build REST API for different organizers
 - Collaborate and build bash script to automate the process of building network, installing chaincode, installing web app

projects.title: Web Blog
projects.bodyText:
- Developed simple web blog for users
 - Implementing from idea of Viblo web blog
 - Built REST API with Spring Boot and PostgreSQL
 - Built WebMVC UI and Bootstrap
 - Built authentication with Spring Security
 - Built CRUD operations on multiple components with PostgreSQL database

projects.title: Time Scheduler Web App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed Time Scheduler Web App in Java
- Using Tomcat Server and Postgres Database
 - Establishing the Cron Job to run the scheduler every period of time
